# List All Contacts

# Description

Retrieve a single or multiple contacts using a filter.

# Untitled Section

text="Type the content"

# Configuration

* 







* Expand - Expand the respective fields in the response: minimal, partial, or complete.
* Last updated at - Last updated date and time of the contact. Use the calendar widget to set a date. This field supports DateTimeOffset type input.



* Contacts - The retrieved contacts. Automatically generated output variable.
